name: Tulum Plus Amazing Caverns
description: Tour two of the biggest tourist attractions in Playa del Carmen in one easy excursion!  Travel in air-conditioned style directly from your Playa del Carmen hotel or the ferry pier to the Tulum Mayan Ruins, the walled city of the Mayas.  Hire a guide and take a trip back into the past, as you're wowed by the lost empire of the Mayas.
